dialogue: You should follow the advice of the experts.
Well, no, you also have to do your own research to know which experts are right.
If I knew which experts were right, wouldn't that make me smarter than the experts?
Doing my own research works for me, so you can always come and ask me who is right.
How would I know you were right?
Because I do my own research.
Maybe you can teach the experts how to do that?
